type.name: org.gradle.nativeplatform.BuildType
type.description: Specifies a build-type for a native binary. Common build types are 'debug' and 'release', but others may be defined.

method.name: getDisplayName
method.description: Returns a human-consumable name for this build type.

property.name: displayName
property.description: Returns a human-consumable name for this build type.
